structure.unit: A AUTOMATED MOTOR VEHICLE REGISTRATION SYSTEM

law.catch_line: Department of Vehicle Regulation to provide notice of fraudulent documents to State Police.
law.text:
The Department of Vehicle Regulation shall promptly notify the Department of Kentucky State Police of the particulars of:
Any attempted or actual registration or titling in this state of a stolen motor vehicle, or trailer, or motor vehicle or trailer whose true identity is in doubt, of which it becomes aware;
Counterfeit, stolen, or altered ownership documents it receives; and
Attempts to supply, or supplying to it, of false or fraudulent information in any application for a certificate of registration, certificate of title for a motor vehicle or trailer in this state.
law.history: Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 206, effective June 26, 2007. -- Created 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 164, sec. 48, effective July 15, 1982.
